channel.title: [x64 Luncher] What you need to run a client on a x64 computer
channel.description:
I have noticed people wonder why there server only runs for a small amount of time then cashing.
this should help.
If your runinng win7 x64
You need a x64 luncher
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/file/myyzdyywjvw/Launch Client (64-bit).rar]http://www.mediafire.com/file/myyzdyywjvw/Launch Client (64-bit).rar[/url]
It can be downloaded here.
Pic of proof. [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/15n6t05.jpg[/img]
[u][b][size=36pt]NOTE:[/size][/b][/u] I did not make this
Credits: 99.999% to the maker 00.001% to me for uploading
Edit: If this is the wrong section could a mod please move to the the right section thanks

item.title: [x64 Luncher] What you need to run a client on a x64 computer
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“ERS, post:6, topic:345945”]can u please tell me how to do it?

[quote author=sig00 link=topic=442324.msg3248470#msg3248470 date=1277568483]
Its quite simple to get them to work, you just edit the run file and redirect it to your java (x86) takes about 3 seconds.
[/quote][/quote]

In your run and compile batch files edit the locations of your Java by type (x86) next to Program Files

C:/Program Files (x86)/

Read full topic
